values:
2708 words so far at the end of day 2!  Not as good as I would have liked it to be today, since I was home sick.  But not too shabby in general.  Hope to get to 5k tomorrow or the day after.

Exaustion.

Hokay folks.  This is <lj user="isilwenmacar">'s writing journal.  And right now, it's the first day of NaNoWriMo.  And I need to get the hell started.

Friend me if you want, but not everything will be public.  Some of it is just to save my work so I can get to it from anywhere.

Peace out.
